channel.title: 🏢 George Mason University on NeurIPS 2024
channel.description: Recent content in 🏢 George Mason University on NeurIPS 2024

item.title: An Accelerated Algorithm for Stochastic Bilevel Optimization under Unbounded Smoothness
item.description: AccBO: A new accelerated algorithm achieves O(ε⁻³) oracle complexity for stochastic bilevel optimization with unbounded smoothness, significantly improving upon existing O(ε⁻⁴) methods.
